root: ^Here are the red flowers you needed.
^Wow, thanks a lot! You do work fast, it's barely breaking the evening.
^As a token of my appreciation, I'll make you a delicious Lily Town salad, on the house.
^A-are you sure? I don't want you to waste your ingredients for me.
^Don't worry about it. It's been a long time since we had any new customers. Might as well show you the premier Lily Town hospitality treatment.
^Thank you so much, I'll be sure to eat it once I get back to my lodgings.
^If you have time tomorrow, swing by the Cafe and try out one of our finest dishes. I recommend the Sweet and Savory Fish Stew.
^I'll be sure to come by tomorrow then.
